text:
League 1
PSG: Tuchel's surprising confession on Icardi
In the mixed zone last night, the Paris coach revealed that his striker played for several weeks, injured.
07 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Thomas Rassouli



Mauro Icardi struck again. Inaccurate since his arrival, the center-forward of Paris Saint-Germain found the net yesterday, giving the advantage to the score and finally the victory to his team. Still ahead of Edinson Cavani in the hierarchy of attackers, the player still tied to Inter Milan had to leave his place last night, touched ankle. A fact of play that does not seem to worry excessively Thomas Tuchel, who has also made a surprising revelation about his player.




"He is accustomed"




Mauro Icardi, Thomas Tuchel + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"I think he's still strong and that's not too bad." entrusted the coach to RMC Sport after the match. "He had a lot of pain but he's used to playing with it, he's played like that against Real Madrid and Galatasaray, he's in treatment now, but I'm still worried, we have too many injuries.
¬†Mauro Icardi: all information about the player
